This class provides an empty implementation of IDLV2\+Parser\+Visitor$<$\+Result$>$, which can be extended to create a visitor which only needs to handle a subset of the available methods.

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class provides an empty implementation of IDLV2\+Parser\+Visitor$<$\+Result$>$, which can be extended to create a visitor which only needs to handle a subset of the available methods. 


\begin{DoxyTemplParams}{Template Parameters}
{\em Result} & The return type of the visit operation.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyTemplParams}
